attributes.title: The Inner Space You Carry is YOU
attributes.description:
In this video (08 February, 2018), Paramahamsa Nithyananda reveals the importance of our Space dimension and how the other dimensions - length, breadth, and depth - do not constitute who we are.

Based on this video, answer the following questions to receive educational credits from Nithyananda University:

Q. The length dimension (logic) of your existence is your _________ a) visualization b) imagination c) declaration d) prayer

Submit your answers here: https://nithyanandauniversity.exphosted.com/?q=share%2Flearning%2Fcourse-details%2F728
